text: wlys qabwl altawbat liladhin yusirrun ealaa airtikab almeasy, wala yarjieun 'iilaa rabahum 'iilaa 'an tatiahum skrat almwt, fayaqul ahdhm: 'iiniy tubt alan, kama la tuqbl tawbatan aladhin yamutun wahum jahdwn, munkarun lwhdanyt allah wrsalt rasulih muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm. 'uwlayik almsrrun ealaa almeasy 'iilaa 'ana matu, waljahdwn aladhin yamutun wahum kfar, 'aetadna lahum edhabana mwjeana
